Hero.Title: Health & Quality Guaranteed
Hero.Subtitle: General Trade, Agricultural & Animal Feed Production Company

CTA.Title: Ready to Start Your Next Project?
CTA.Subtitle: Let us provide you with the high-quality feed and agricultural services you need. Get in touch with our team today.

AboutUsHome.Subtitle: About Us
AboutUsHome.Title: Welcome to Ghadir Babil
AboutUsHome.Description: Ghadir Babil began in 2004 by establishing an animal feed factory, and now it is one of the competing companies in Iraq. We are an Iraqi company specialized in general trade, agricultural, and animal feed production.

ProjectsHome.Title: Our Projects
ProjectsHome.FeedFactoryDescription: We produce high-quality broiler and layer poultry feed for all stages.
ProjectsHome.PoultryFarmsDescription: We grow poultry without the use of drugs and antibiotics in our specialized farms.
ProjectsHome.ResearchCentreDescription: Our laboratories conduct experiments to make our products as healthy as possible.
ProjectsHome.GeneralTradeDescription: We offer import-export services, including hatching eggs, feed additives, and raw materials.

PartnersMarquee.Title: Our Valued Partners
PartnersMarquee.Description: We are proud to collaborate with industry-leading companies to deliver the best products.

feed-factory.title: Ghadir Babil Feed Factory
feed-factory.description: This is our first project, where we produce high quality chicken feed for all stages.

poultry-farms.title: Ghadir Babil Poultry Farms
poultry-farms.description: We grow poultry without the use of drugs and antibiotics in our poultry farms, prioritizing consumer health and a safe production chain.

research.title: Research Centre
research.description: We have laboratories where we conduct experiments to make our products as healthy and high quality as possible.

trade.title: General Trade Centre
trade.description: We offer import-export services in our general trade centre.
